nodes.text: "Toy Wars" is an article published in Star Wars Insider 107, written by Jason Fry. It discusses the design and production of Star Wars action figures scheduled to be released by Hasbro in 2010. It features commentary by Hasbro's Vice President of Global Brand Management and Development Darryl DePriest; Design Manager Brian Parrish; Design Director Brian Wilk; and sculpting manager Dave Vennemeyer.
